variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: PARTICIPANT ID [Visit 9] [Medication Survey Form, MSR]

variable.name: VISIT
variable.description: CONTACT OCCASION [Visit 9] [Medication Survey Form, MSR]

variable.name: MSRC1
variable.description: Q1. A. Reception. Have you taken any medications in the past two weeks? This includes all prescriptions medications, all over-the-counter medications, all vitamins, minerals, herbs, and dietary supplements? [Visit 9] [Medication Survey Form, MSR]

variable.name: MSRC2
variable.description: Q2. A. Reception. Did you bring all the medications you used in the past two weeks, or their containers? This includes all prescription medications, all over-the-counter medications, all vitamins, minerals, herbs, and dietary supplements? [Visit 9] [Medication Survey Form, MSR]

variable.name: MSRC3A
variable.description: Q3a. A. Reception. Could we follow up on this after the visit so that we can get the information from the (other) medication labels? [EXPLAIN FOLLOW-UP OPTIONS] [Visit 9] [Medication Survey Form, MSR]

variable.name: MSRC29A
variable.description: Q29a. C. Interview. Did you take medications in the past two weeks for: high blood pressure? [Visit 9] [Medication Survey Form, MSR]

variable.name: MSRC29B
variable.description: Q29b. C. Interview. Did you take medications in the past two weeks for: high blood cholesterol? [Visit 9] [Medication Survey Form, MSR]

variable.name: MSRC29C
variable.description: Q29c. C. Interview. Did you take medications in the past two weeks for: angina or chest pain? [Visit 9] [Medication Survey Form, MSR]

variable.name: MSRC29D
variable.description: Q29d. C. Interview. Did you take medications in the past two weeks for: control of heart rhythm? [Visit 9] [Medication Survey Form, MSR]

variable.name: MSRC29E
variable.description: Q29e. C. Interview. Did you take medications in the past two weeks for: heart failure or fluid on the lungs? [Visit 9] [Medication Survey Form, MSR]

variable.name: MSRC29F
variable.description: Q29f. C. Interview. Did you take medications in the past two weeks for: blood thinning? [Visit 9] [Medication Survey Form, MSR]

variable.name: MSRC29G
variable.description: Q29g. C. Interview. Did you take medications in the past two weeks for: diabetes or high blood sugar? [Visit 9] [Medication Survey Form, MSR]

variable.name: MSRC29H
variable.description: Q29h. C. Interview. Did you take medications in the past two weeks for: stroke? [Visit 9] [Medication Survey Form, MSR]

variable.name: MSRC29I
variable.description: Q29i. C. Interview. Did you take medications in the past two weeks for: leg pain when walking? [Visit 9] [Medication Survey Form, MSR]

variable.name: MSRC30A
variable.description: Q30a. D. Medication-taking behaviors. If you have not taken a prescription for this reason: you were in a hurry, too busy, or forgot [Visit 9] [Medication Survey Form, MSR]

variable.name: MSRC30B
variable.description: Q30b. D. Medication-taking behaviors. If you have not taken a prescription for this reason: it was inconvenient, for example, the medication needed to be refrigerated, or had to be taken with food [Visit 9] [Medication Survey Form, MSR]

variable.name: MSRC30C
variable.description: Q30c. D. Medication-taking behaviors. If you have not taken a prescription for this reason: you thought the medication would not do you any good [Visit 9] [Medication Survey Form, MSR]

variable.name: MSRC30D
variable.description: Q30d. D. Medication-taking behaviors. If you have not taken a prescription for this reason: the medication made you feel bad [Visit 9] [Medication Survey Form, MSR]

variable.name: MSRC30E
variable.description: Q30e. D. Medication-taking behaviors. If you have not taken a prescription for this reason: if you took the medication, you wouldn't be able to carry out your normal activities-for example, driving [Visit 9] [Medication Survey Form, MSR]

variable.name: MSRC30F
variable.description: Q30f. D. Medication-taking behaviors. If you have not taken a prescription for this reason: you thought you might become addicted or hooked on the medication [Visit 9] [Medication Survey Form, MSR]

variable.name: MSRC30G
variable.description: Q30g. D. Medication-taking behaviors. If you have not taken a prescription for this reason: you do not like to take medicine [Visit 9] [Medication Survey Form, MSR]

variable.name: MSRC30H
variable.description: Q30h. D. Medication-taking behaviors. If you have not taken a prescription for this reason: you were trying to do without it [Visit 9] [Medication Survey Form, MSR]

variable.name: MSRC30J
variable.description: Q30j. D. Medication-taking behaviors. If you have not taken a prescription for this reason: did not have the medication available [Visit 9] [Medication Survey Form, MSR]

variable.name: MSRC30K
variable.description: Q30k. D. Medication-taking behaviors. If you have not taken a prescription for this reason: are there any other reasons why you haven't taken a prescribed medication? [Visit 9] [Medication Survey Form, MSR]

variable.name: MSRC32
variable.description: Q32. E. Aspirin and NSAID use. During the past two weeks, did you take any aspirin, Alka-Seltzer, cold medicine or headache powder? [Visit 9] [Medication Survey Form, MSR]

variable.name: MSRC33
variable.description: Q33. E. Aspirin and NSAID use. Are you now taking aspirin, or a medicine containing aspirin, on a regular basis? This does not include Tylenol nor Advil [Visit 9] [Medication Survey Form, MSR]

variable.name: MSRC34A
variable.description: Q34a. E. Aspirin and NSAID use. What is the strength of aspirin in the pill? [Visit 9] [Medication Survey Form, MSR]

variable.name: MSRC34B
variable.description: Q34b. E. Aspirin and NSAID use. How many days a week, on average, are you taking this medication? [Visit 9] [Medication Survey Form, MSR]

variable.name: MSRC34C
variable.description: Q34c. E. Aspirin and NSAID use. How many pills are you taking per week, on average? [Visit 9] [Medication Survey Form, MSR]

variable.name: MSRC34D
variable.description: Q34d. E. Aspirin and NSAID use. For what purpose are you taking this medication? [Visit 9] [Medication Survey Form, MSR]

variable.name: MSRC34E
variable.description: Q34e. E. Aspirin and NSAID use. When did you start taking aspirin, or a medicine containing aspirin, on a regular basis? [Visit 9] [Medication Survey Form, MSR]

variable.name: MSRC31A
variable.description: Q31a. D. Medication-taking behaviors. Did you ever forget to take you medicine? [Visit 9] [Medication Survey Form, MSR]

variable.name: MSRC31B
variable.description: Q31b. D. Medication-taking behaviors. Are you careless at times about taking your medicine? [Visit 9] [Medication Survey Form, MSR]

variable.name: MSRC31C
variable.description: Q31c. D. Medication-taking behaviors. When you feel better do you sometimes stop taking your medicine? [Visit 9] [Medication Survey Form, MSR]

variable.name: MSRC31D
variable.description: Q31d. D. Medication-taking behaviors. Sometimes if you feel worse when you take medicine , do you stop taking it? [Visit 9] [Medication Survey Form, MSR]

variable.name: MSRC35A
variable.description: Q35a. E. Aspirin and NSAID use. Except for aspirin or Tylenol, are you now taking other non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drugs or arthritis medicines on a regular basis? Examples include Ibuprofen, Advil, Nuprin, Motrin, Aleve, Naprosyn, Feldene and Clinoril [Visit 9] [Medication Survey Form, MSR]

variable.name: MSRC35B
variable.description: Q35b. E. Aspirin and NSAID use. What is the brand name of the medicine? [Visit 9] [Medication Survey Form, MSR]

variable.name: MSRC35D
variable.description: Q35d. E. Aspirin and NSAID use. How many pills per week are you taking, on average? [Visit 9] [Medication Survey Form, MSR]

variable.name: MSRC35E
variable.description: Q35e. E. Aspirin and NSAID use. When did you start taking [insert name] on a regular basis? [Visit 9] [Medication Survey Form, MSR]

variable.name: MSRC36A
variable.description: Q36a. F. Folk medicine. Have you used in the last 2 weeks for medical reasons only: vinegar? [Visit 9] [Medication Survey Form, MSR]

variable.name: MSRC36B
variable.description: Q36b. F. Folk medicine. Have you used in the last 2 weeks for medical reasons only: vinegar? How many days during the past 2 weeks? [Visit 9] [Medication Survey Form, MSR]

variable.name: MSRC37A
variable.description: Q37a. F. Folk medicine. Have you used in the last 2 weeks for medical reasons only: Epsom salts? [Visit 9] [Medication Survey Form, MSR]

variable.name: MSRC37B
variable.description: Q37b. F. Folk medicine. Have you used in the last 2 weeks for medical reasons only: Epsom salts? How many days during the past 2 weeks? [Visit 9] [Medication Survey Form, MSR]

variable.name: MSRC38A
variable.description: Q38a. F. Folk medicine. Have you used in the last 2 weeks for medical reasons only: lemon juice or lemon? [Visit 9] [Medication Survey Form, MSR]

variable.name: MSRC38B
variable.description: Q38b. F. Folk medicine. Have you used in the last 2 weeks for medical reasons only: lemon juice or lemon? How many days during the past 2 weeks? [Visit 9] [Medication Survey Form, MSR]

variable.name: MSRC39A
variable.description: Q39a. F. Folk medicine. Have you used in the last 2 weeks for medical reasons only: garlic? [Visit 9] [Medication Survey Form, MSR]

variable.name: MSRC39B
variable.description: Q39b. F. Folk medicine. Have you used in the last 2 weeks for medical reasons only: garlic? How many days during the past 2 weeks? [Visit 9] [Medication Survey Form, MSR]

variable.name: MSRC40A
variable.description: Q40a. F. Folk medicine. Have you used in the last 2 weeks for medical reasons only: teas? [Visit 9] [Medication Survey Form, MSR]

variable.name: MSRC40B
variable.description: Q40b. F. Folk medicine. Have you used in the last 2 weeks for medical reasons only: teas? How many days during the past 2 weeks? [Visit 9] [Medication Survey Form, MSR]

variable.name: MSRC41A
variable.description: Q41a. F. Folk medicine. Have you used in the last 2 weeks for medical reasons only: roots? [Visit 9] [Medication Survey Form, MSR]

variable.name: MSRC41B
variable.description: Q41b. F. Folk medicine. Have you used in the last 2 weeks for medical reasons only: roots? How many days during the past 2 weeks? [Visit 9] [Medication Survey Form, MSR]

variable.name: MSRC42A
variable.description: Q42a. F. Folk medicine. Have you taken any other home remedies, teas, roots, or herbs in the last 2 weeks? [Visit 9] [Medication Survey Form, MSR]

variable.name: MSRC42B
variable.description: Q42b. F. Folk medicine. How many days during the past 2 weeks? [Visit 9] [Medication Survey Form, MSR]

variable.name: MSRC43A
variable.description: Q43a. F. Folk medicine. Have you ever used any other home remedies, teas, roots, herbs, or other medicines? [Visit 9] [Medication Survey Form, MSR]

variable.name: MSRC43B
variable.description: Q43b. F. Folk medicine. Was this for your heart or for other symptoms? [Visit 9] [Medication Survey Form, MSR]

variable.name: MSRC43D
variable.description: Q43d. F. Folk medicine. About how often would you say you have used any of these remedies? Would you say daily, weekly, several times a month, monthly, several times a year, yearly, rarely, almost never, or never? [Visit 9] [Medication Survey Form, MSR]

variable.name: MSRCflag
variable.description: Data record present? [Visit 9] [Medication Survey Form, MSR]

variable.name: VERS
variable.description: FORM VERSION [Visit 9] [Medication Survey Form, MSR]
